NO_INPUT: Please use only song url or query to play.
NO_VOICE: {{member}} you have to be connected to a voice channel before you can use this command!
CURRENT_QUEUE_TO_LONG_10000: {{member}} your current queue is too long! (**10000** or more songs)
CURRENT_QUEUE_TO_LONG_1500: {{member}} your current queue is too long! (**1500** or more songs) you need prime to add more songs. Click on the Button for more informations.
CANT_FIND: Cannot find a track or playlist with this input.
PLAYLIST_TO_LONG_10000: {{member}} If you add this playlist to your queue, the queue limit of **10000 songs** will be reached, due to limits you are not able to do this.
PLAYLIST_TO_LONG_5000: {{member}} If you add this playlist to your queue, the queue limit of **1500 songs** will be reached, you need prime to add more songs. Click on the Button for more informations.
PLAY_ERROR: An error occured while start playing
NO_VALID_INPUT: Query contains an link, which is not an allowed / valid link!
